CustomField.formula: if ( OR ( TEXT (Type) = "Agentur", TEXT (Type) = "Klass. Agentur: Kreativ" , TEXT (Type) = "Klass. Agentur: Media Einkauf", ISPICKVAL (Type ,"Klass. Agentur: Mediaplanung") , TEXT (Type) = "Klass. Agentur: Mediaplanung", TEXT (Type) = "Online Agentur: Kreativ", TEXT (Type)= "Online Agentur: Media Einkauf", TEXT (Type)= "Online Agentur: Mediaplanung", TEXT (Type) = "Spezial Agentur: Kreativ", TEXT (Type)= "Spezial Agentur: Media Einkauf", TEXT (Type) = "Spezial Agentur: Mediaplanung" , TEXT (Type) = "Dialog Agentur" , TEXT (Type) = "Event / Spons. Agentur", TEXT (Type) = "Performance Agentur (Wettbewerber)" , TEXT (Type) = "Affiliate Publisher (Agentur)", TEXT (Type) = "FullService-Agentur" , TEXT (Type) = "PR - Agentur", TEXT (Type) = "Hauptagentur", TEXT (Type) = "Einkaufsgemeinschaft", TEXT (Type) = "Spezialagentur 3S", TEXT (Type) = "Mediaagentur 3S", TEXT (Type) = "Online-/Digitalagentur 3S", TEXT (Type) = "Spezialagentur 3S" , TEXT (Type) = "Kreativagentur" ), "Agentur", IF ( OR( TEXT (Type) = "Direktkunde" , TEXT (Type) = "Telesales", TEXT (Type) = "Vermarkter", TEXT (Type) = "SSP (Sales Side Plattform)", TEXT (Type) = "DSP / Trading Desk", TEXT (Type) = "Wettbewerber", TEXT (Type) = "Mediakunde (Google, Text, ...)", TEXT (Type) = "Konzern", TEXT (Type) = "Werbetreibender", TEXT (Type) = "Werbungtreibender" ), "Werbungtreibender", if( OR( TEXT (Type) = "Websitebetreiber", TEXT (Type) = "Publisher", TEXT (Type) = "Publisher: Owned", TEXT (Type) = "Publisher: Operated", TEXT (Type) = "Publisher: Media-Buy", TEXT (Type) = "Publisher: Men", TEXT (Type) = "Publisher: Women", TEXT (Type) = "Publisher: General Interest", TEXT (Type) = "Broker (Publisher)", TEXT (Type) = "externer Dienstleister", TEXT (Type) = "Mandant" ), "Publisher", "Andere" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Account-Typ
